fxInfo_clarification: Recruitment of the chief executive is "open" to the extent that all the politically active population has an opportunity, in principle, to attain the position through a regularized process.
fxInfo_question: Is the process of recruiting the executive open to everyone?

fxInfo_responses.value: Closed: Chief executives are determined by hereditary succession and assume executive powers by right of descent.
Dual Executive — Designation: Hereditary succession plus executive or court selection of an effective chief minister.
Executive — Election: Hereditary succession plus electoral selection of an effective chief minister.
Open: Chief executives are chosen by elite designation, competitive election, or transitional arrangements between designation and election.
